body_html: I can't find a parameter output_size there? Making use of ConvTranspose for this seems like a really good idea though. I have ConvTranspose layers at the moment, but I was only using them for the 'zero' upsampling. From a quick test I think you're right, it seems as though I can do what I need in terms of padding there as well. Thanks for your help

body: I can't find a parameter `output_size` there? Making use of `ConvTranspose` for this seems like a really good idea though. I have `ConvTranspose` layers at the moment, but I was only using them for the 'zero' upsampling. From a quick test I think you're right, it seems as though I can do what I need in terms of padding there as well. Thanks for your help
